title: jaya jaya sadguru
sahitya:
jaya jaya sadguru rAmdAs Om shrI rAm jayarAm enavuyir yOgi


anupallavi

  bhayam iruL accam bandhanai cinti bhaktargaLuyya shakti aLittAn


caraNam    vIra shivAjikku veTri aLittAn vEda dharmam vaLar bOdham aLittAn
bhArata nATTukkup-pAvanam aLittAn bhagavAn parama sukhavAn hanumAn
